response.overview: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into animals and sent off into The Woods.
response.title: The Lobster

titles.title: The Lobster: Hummer sind auch nur Menschen

results.name: Out on DVD, Blu-Ray and Digital 8 Feb
The Lobster Q&A with Rachel Weisz and Colin Farrell
